com.topcoder.catalog.entity.unittests.persistence
Class CommonEntityTest<T extends java.io.Serializable>

java.lang.Object
  junit.framework.Assert
      junit.framework.TestCase
          com.topcoder.catalog.entity.unittests.persistence.CommonEntityTest<T>
Type Parameters:
T - class which represents entity to test
All Implemented Interfaces:
junit.framework.Test
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseCompClientEntityTest, BaseCompForumEntityTest, BaseCompLinkEntityTest, BaseComponentEntityTest, BaseCompUserEntityTest, BaseCompVersionDatesEntityTest, BaseCompVersionEntityTest, BasePhaseEntityTest, BaseTechnologyEntityTest, CategoryEntityTest
public abstract class CommonEntityTest<T extends java.io.Serializable>
extends junit.framework.TestCase

This is a parent for all entities tests. It provides basic functionality such as persistEntity(java.io.Serializable), getEntities(java.lang.String, java.lang.Object...), merge(T).

Also it creates EntityManager and EntityTransaction instances.

Version:
1.0
Author:
TCSDEVELOPER

Stores the entity to database.

Parameters:
